fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Champion: If you are placed into a Duel, draw 2 cards immediately. 
- Fervor: If you have 1 HP at the start of a phase, draw 2 (Satcheled) cards immediately.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Reckless Rush: Lose 1 HP. Gain a random non-Special Attacking card. [Infinite, 1 CD] 
- Calculated Charge: Lose 1 HP. Gain a random Special Attacking card, or non-Special Attacking card of your choice. [2 uses, 2 CD, Unlocks D2]
- Rest: Play Heal! on yourself. [3 uses, 1 CD]
